entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 12:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NW 25 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
